page.title: 04PUNKS IN KETTERING
page.content: In and around Kettering there are about 50 Punks. They are young people ( 16- 20 yrs) who like loud music with lots of drum playing by groups like Sioux and Exploited. Many dress in weird clothes, often black, which can be expensive leather or second hand. Kettering Punks go to Leicester or London for clothes.Hair is often black, yellow,red or green, shaved at the sides and mostly sticks out from their heads. They put soap on it, crimp it back comb, lacquer and gel the roots. Girls use bright stage make up. The Punk we interviewed said she likes being stared at. Although she is clever there is no job for her. It is not because of what she wears because at an interview she wears ordinary clothes and brushes her hair flat.
